mapper.select: SELECT /* com.itsme.letitgo.main.model.mapper.MainPageMapper#selectPremiumRecruit() */ A.RNUM , A.JOB_POST_NO , A.JOB_POST_TITLE , A.CO_COM_NAME , A.CO_MEM_NO , A.JOB_POST_MIN_EXPERIENCE , A.JOB_POST_MAX_EXPERIENCE , A.JOB_NAME , A.JOB_POST_ENROLL_DATE , A.JOB_POST_DEADLINE , A.CO_ADDRESS , A.MEM_FILE_PATH FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.JOB_POST_NO , B.JOB_POST_TITLE , B.CO_COM_NAME , B.CO_MEM_NO , B.JOB_POST_MIN_EXPERIENCE , B.JOB_POST_MAX_EXPERIENCE , B.JOB_NAME , B.JOB_NO , B.JOB_POST_ENROLL_DATE , B.JOB_POST_DEADLINE , B.JOB_POST_APPLYING_KINDS , B.CO_ADDRESS , B.JOB_POST_CONTENTS , B.JOB_POST_KINDS , B.EXPOSURE_USE_DATE , B.EXPOSURE_END_DATE , B.MEM_FILE_PATH FROM (SELECT DISTINCT JP.JOB_POST_NO , JP.JOB_POST_TITLE , AI.CO_COM_NAME , AI.CO_MEM_NO , JP.JOB_POST_MIN_EXPERIENCE , JP.JOB_POST_MAX_EXPERIENCE , JF.JOB_NAME , JP.JOB_NO , JP.JOB_POST_ENROLL_DATE , JP.JOB_POST_DEADLINE , JP.JOB_POST_APPLYING_KINDS , AI.CO_ADDRESS , JP.JOB_POST_CONTENTS , JP.JOB_POST_KINDS , UH.EXPOSURE_USE_DATE , UH.EXPOSURE_END_DATE , SUBSTR(TA.MEM_FILE_PATH,21) MEM_FILE_PATH FROM TBL_JOB_POSTING JP JOIN TBL_CO_MEMBER_ADD_INFO AI ON (JP.CO_MEM_NO = AI.CO_MEM_NO) JOIN TBL_JOB_FIELD JF ON (JP.JOB_NO = JF.JOB_NO) JOIN TBL_JOB_POSTING_REQ_SKILLS RS ON (JP.JOB_POST_NO = RS.JOB_POST_NO) JOIN TBL_SKILLS S ON (S.SKILLS_NO = RS.SKILLS_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_EXPOSURE_USAGE_HISTORY UH ON (JP.JOB_POST_NO = UH.JOB_POST_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ATTACHMENT TA ON(AI.CO_MEM_NO = TA.MEM_NO) WHERE JP.JOB_POST_KINDS = '승인된공고' AND SYSDATE BETWEEN UH.EXPOSURE_USE_DATE AND UH.EXPOSURE_END_DATE AND JP.JOB_POST_DEADLINE > SYSDATE AND TA.MEM_FILE_KINDS = '프로필사진' ORDER BY UH.EXPOSURE_USE_DATE DESC ) B ) A
